subject: Algarve Cup (Soccer)
Football Association Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Amy Rodriguez and Megan Rapinoe scored first-half goals and Abby Wambach returned from anl injury as the United States won its opener at the Algarve Cup.
snippet: Amy Rodriguez and Megan Rapinoe scored first-half goals and Abby Wambach returned from anl injury as the United States won its opener at the Algarve Cup.
